DOC.detailed_description: Photodynamic therapy ( PDT ) methyl-aminolevulinate ( MAL ) effective treatment actinic keratosis ( AK ) . Many strategy study improve production protoporphyrin IX ( PpIX ) , improve efficacy PDT . Pre-treatment skin fractional laser resurface novel alternative technique improve efficacy PDT AK . Our previous study show ablative fractional laser-primed PDT ( AFL-PDT ) offer high efficacy conventional MAL-PDT treatment many disease , AK , actinic cheilitis , Bowen 's disease basal cell carcinoma.1-4 Iontophoresis another method improve efficacy PDT . Iontophoresis transdermal drug-delivery technique use mild electric current enhance transport ionic specie across membrane . Iontophoresis widely use enhance drug delivery . Mizutani K et al.5 report 5 AK patient successfully treat direct-current pulsed iontophoresis-assisted 5-aminolevulinic acid ( ALA ) -PDT . Boddé HE et al.6 study iontophoretic transport ALA quantitatively vitro demonstrate enhanced transport ALA iontophoresis . Until , appropriate incubation time AFL-PDT elucidate . In previous study , investigate efficacy AFL-PDT short incubation time.7 Although AFL-PDT short incubation time ( 2 h ) show enhanced efficacy conventional MAL-PDT standard incubation time , standard AFL-PDT 3-h incubation time show significantly high efficacy AFL-PDT short incubation time . The aim study evaluate efficacy iontophoresis AFL-PDT AK treatment . Consequently , compare efficacy , recurrence rate , cosmetic outcome safety iontophoresis-assisted AFL-PDT 2-h incubation time conventional AFL-PDT 2-h 3-h incubation time .
